data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kamangar, Barzan Bahrami, Prokofiev, Artem M., Ghaderi, Edris, Nalbant, Theodore T. (2014): Stone loaches of Choman River system, Kurdistan, Iran (Teleostei: Cypriniformes: Nemacheilidae). Zootaxa 3755 (1): 33-61, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3755.1.2
